bomberman.core.ui
Class TextGuiComponent

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.ui.TextGuiComponent

public class TextGuiComponent
extends java.lang.Object

A base class for displaying a text-based GUI component on the screen. This class handles the common tasks of rendering the text to display and adding it to a layer.

Nested Class Summary
static class TextGuiComponent.Effect
          The implemented text effects.
 
Field Summary
private  boolean centered
          This parameter indicates if the text's position is centered at the x and y coordinates
private  playn.core.Layer current
          The current layer displaying the text or null if nothing is being displayed currently
private  int outlineColor
          The outline effect's color.
private  int outlineWidth
          The outline effect's width.
private  playn.core.GroupLayer parent
          The parent layer to which this component's content is added
private  int shadowColor
          The shadows effect's color
private  float x
          The x position of the component in pixels
private  float y
          The y position of the component in pixels
 
Constructor Summary

          Creates a new TextGuiComponent at the specified location with the specified parent to which the content will be added.

                   int fontSize,
                   int color,

Updates the text currently displayed by this component with the provided text.

color - The font color.
